name: quiz-management-system-100q
description: Full-stack quiz management system with 100 integrated questions across 4 CS subjects

scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Setup complete. Run: npm run setup-db'
scripts.setup-db: mysql -u root -p < database_schema.sql && mysql -u root -p < data_migration.sql
scripts.reset-db: mysql -u root -p -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS quiz_system;' && npm run setup-db

author: CS Student - DBMS Project
